sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO class_room (member_idx, student_idx, class_number) VALUES (#member_idx#, #student_idx#, #class_number#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT c.class_number, s.student_name, m.member_name, m.member_tel FROM CLASS_ROOM c, STUDENT s, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEMBER_IDX = m.MEMBER_IDX AND c.STUDENT_IDX = s.STUDENT_IDX AND c.CLASS_NUMBER = #class_number#
